list_definition.definition: (usually with to) strongly or easily affected (by something)

list_definition.mean_english: dễ bị ảnh hưởng bởi cái gì
list_definition.definition: (usually with aboutor to) easily hurt or offended

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She is very sensitive to criticism.

list_definition.definition: having or showing artistic good taste
